reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one mentioning it looks great with or without a belt, and they appreciate its well-made construction and comfortable fit. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its color, with one customer highlighting its dark navy and white soft texture, and its flattering design that complements various body types. However, the length and fabric quality receive mixed reviews - while some find it perfect, others say it runs large, and while some praise the fabric, others describe it as cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars COMFORTABLE AND FLATTERING
items.body: I absolutely love this brown long sleeve dress! The color is rich and versatile—perfect for fall but neutral enough to wear year-round. The fit is incredibly flattering without being too tight, and the fabric has just the right amount of stretch to make it comfortable for all-day wear. The long sleeves give it a polished look, and the dress easily transitions from casual daytime errands with sneakers to a dressed-up dinner with boots or heels. I’ve already received multiple compliments! It also washes well—no fading, no shrinking. This has quickly become one of my go-to pieces, and I’m considering ordering it in another color if available. Highly recommend if you’re looking for something simple and stylish. Read more
items.author: Tammie Hutchins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit Perfect-Want to buy in every color
items.body: I always used to believe that as beautiful as they are, I would never wear skirts or dresses due to the hassle of shaving or feeling bloated and insecure. I had recently found a long skirt from Earth Bound that changed my perspective on my clothing style and have since been in search of a dress that would do the same. I feel this genuinely might be it, and I do believe I'll be on a goal of getting one in every color as events come up in the future. I was prioritizing a more modest/full coverage dress that I would not have to stress about and could just throw it on before leaving the house and still feel pretty. I have found dresses in the past to hug my arms like little sausages or sleeves be far too short that I can not rest comfortably, but that's not a problem in this dress. I can also bloat comfortably and not worry about looking big after a good meal. The best part is that it is a light and breathable material for these upcoming summers in Texas. I personally don't see any issue with transparency so far but have read other reviews that mention it as a problem. The quality of material could be better but that's just life nowadays and it's not causing any kind of sensory issues so I won't complain. I ordered a XL and I am 5'4" and 170-180lbs. I have about a 44" hips, 34" waist, 42" bust. I ordered the solid army green color. It's absolutely gorgeous and a muted enough color to not draw too much attention. I have cool undertones, pale/pinkish skin, brunette hair, and blue eyes. I normally stick to blues/greens/browns for color choices. Update: Wore it out for the first time and the bottom half was noticed to be slightly transparent in the sunlight. Fortunately, not enough so to be considered indecent. I was able to hide sweatpants under the dress as well for my own comfort when I wore it out the second time. I will likely be ordering a slip to throw under the dress for hot days and keep sweatpants in mind for the winter. This dress would be 10/10 if only it were made of linen or cotton material but still I had no sensory issues and it held up in the rain. So overall 5 stars but 8/10 rating for what was mentioned above. Read more
items.author: Skye

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent dress
items.body: This is surprisingly a rather nice dress. Like most clothing on Amazon, the fabric is polyester but this dress has a bit heavier fabric. I ordered the brown color and it’s soft and kind of got a suede feel. The smocked bodice doesn’t make it appropriate for my conservative office but it will be cute for going out, brunch, casual events. Works for winter too with boots. Length and fit TTS. Read more
items.author: Violetfemme

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!!
items.body: Suppppper cute dress and very flattering. Size was perfect and versatility is endless. Not see through at all and the quality is definitely there. Does get a little wrinkled if not hung up but it is very easy to unwrinkle! Read more
items.author: Michael Brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delightful in blue
items.body: I bought this for my sister in blue. It looks absolutely stunning on her! It cinches in her waist and flares away at her hips. The dress compliments her shape beautifully. She hates showing her arms so the sleeves are a perfect length. Although she is older, this style looks youthful without looking too “young”! However, this style would work for a younger lady as well. It is extremely comfortable and has worn well through many ‘washing’s’. I’m very pleased with this purchase and my sister is still delighted with the dress! Read more
items.author: Kelley N. Pauley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size fits but isn’t flattering for my shape
items.body: This dress gets on and fits me but it isn’t flattering on me because of the size of my tummy. It does not hide well in this but Otherwise it is beautiful, the material is comfortable and has a quality feel. It is heavy enough to drop nicely but light enough to keep cool. I absolutely love the space and comfort in the arms since I have larger arms and the arm length is perfect. The color is as advertised and I would definitely recommend it… once you don’t have a big tummy. For reference: I am 5ft tall About 250lbs My tummy is 51 inches at its most protruding And 18 inches at the largest parts of my arms. I ordered this in XXL Hope this helps. Read more
items.author: The Shanda Show

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress for family photos!
items.body: Super cute dress! I’ve ordered it in two colors for family photos. It’s comfortable and cute! Read more
items.author: Brittany Coale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely happy!!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress!! The blue color is so beautiful and the fit is perfect. True to size. I am 5'8 and the dress hits below the knee. The sleeves are shear but the bottom has an underskirt so it is not see through. The bodice is a stretchy smocked and very flattering. You can wear this dress to any occasion and it is very comfortable. It is lightweight and you may need a sweater over it in the winter. So affordable for this quality of a dress! Read more
items.author: daniels

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Solid White, Solid Royal Blue, Solid Coffee, Solid Grey Blue, Solid Wine Red, Floral Red White, Solid Khaki, Solid Dark Blue, Solid Black, Solid Light Brown, Floral Red, Floral Green White, Solid Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
